Reference

Models

bplm0()

Fitting discharge rating curves using Bayesian Power Law Model with constant variance

bplm()

Bayesian Power Law Model

bgplm0()

Bayesian Generalized Power Law Model with Constant Variance

bgplm()

Bayesian Generalized Power Law Model

Tournament - Model comparison

tournament()

Determine the most adequate rating curve model

Methods for bplm0 objects

print(<bplm0>)

Print bplm0 object

summary(<bplm0>)

Summarizing bplm0 fit

autoplot(<bplm0>)

Autoplot bplm0 fit

plot(<bplm0>)

Plot bplm0 fit

predict(<bplm0>)

Predict method for bplm0 fit

Print bplm object

Summarizing bplm fit

autoplot(<bplm>)

Autoplot bplm fit

plot(<bplm>)

Plot bplm fit

predict(<bplm>)

Predict method for bplm fit

Methods for tournament objects

print(<tournament>)

Print tournament object

summary(<tournament>)

Print summary of tournament object

autoplot(<tournament>)

Autoplot - Comparison of models in tournament

plot(<tournament>)

Plot comparison of models in tournament

Data manipulation functions

spread_draws()

Spread MCMC chain draws to data.frame on a wide format

gather_draws()

Gather MCMC chain draws to data.frame on a long format

Data

V316_river

Data from x river in Iceland
